page.title: 07Housing
page.content: About 70 percent of our block is residential land.Most of the houses,shops and schools were built between 1932 and 1938.Although there are some older terraced houses the vast majority of houses are semi-detached. One house recently sold was 4,Deepdene Road,Welling.It has a lounge,dining room,kitchen,conservatory,3 bedrooms,carpets,storage heaters, double glazing and a garage.The price is 43,500 pounds. In a survey of 140 Blackfen pupils,8 of them lived in flats or maisonettes, 58 lived in semi-detached houses,11 in detached houses and 2 in bungalows.All houses had their own gardens.
